name: EC Coverage Validation Rule
description: Validates EC coverage against sale deed registration dates
conditionLogic: User uploads SALEDEED and EC and Sale deed has MULTIPLE survey numbers
expectedResult: EC years must cover the FULL year gap between registration dates specified in the documents.
passExample: Sale deed registered in 2018, EC covers 2017-2020
failExample: Sale deed registered in 2018, EC only covers 2019-2020 (missing 2017-2018)
failMessage: Error: Missing coverage for registration period
